goal: I need to understand the rental market in Atlanta, GA. Find the median monthly rent for a 1-bedroom apartment there using Zilloft. Once you have that number, schedule a 30-minute meeting on my GoCalendar for this Thursday at 4:00 PM titled 'Discuss Atlanta Rental Budget' and paste the median rent price you found directly into the event's description.

evals.description: Verify a new event was created in GoCalendar.
Verify the GoCalendar event has the correct title.
Verify the GoCalendar event is scheduled for Thursday at 4:00 PM and is 30 minutes long.
Verify the median rent price from Zilloft was pasted into the GoCalendar event description.
